title: Chinese Fish Stew
ingredients: ['1kg (6x3cm) fillets fresh fish', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons Shaoxing wine', '2 spring onions, finely chopped and divided', '1 (2.5cm) piece fresh ginger, finely chopped and divided', '800ml vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon chilli bean paste', '2-3 cloves garlic, crushed', '100ml Shaoxing wine', '1 1/2 tablespoons soy sauce', 'monosodium glutamate (MSG) to taste', '2 teaspoons sugar', 'ground white pepper to taste', 'water as needed', '250g Chinese celery, leaves discarded and cut into 4cm lengths', '1 teaspoon cornflour mixed with 1 teaspoon vinegar']
